thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ole A. Fauske
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Ole A. Fauske

author: Ole A. Fauske
title: Ole A. Fauske
text:
I am very satisfied with most of the products I bought at Banggood.com. It's mostly cheap and there is a big catalog of products. As with most shopping from china it might take some time before the packages arrive in my mailbox, but for the most part all my orders have arrived 1-2 weeks after order date. This I would guess is mostly because the slow customs in Norway.
All in all I recommend Banggood!
